common.title: Fast, Secure, and Anonymous Crypto-to-Cash Trading
common.description: Trade Cryptocurrency for Cash Quickly â€” No Upfront Payments Required
common.startTradeDescription: Please fill out the form below to initiate your transaction. One of our agents will contact you via Telegram to guide you through the next steps.

item1.question: What happens after I submit the form?
item1.answer: Once you submit the form, our agent will contact you via your provided Telegram username to discuss the details and next steps.

item2.question: Why do I need to pass a compliance check?
item2.answer: The compliance check ensures that your cryptocurrency wallet adheres to legal standards and is free from any illicit activities. This helps us maintain a secure trading environment for all users.

item3.question: How long does the entire process take?
item3.answer: The process typically takes less than 24 hours from the time you submit the form to the completion of the transaction.

item4.question: Is my personal information secure?
item4.answer: Absolutely. We prioritize your privacy and security. Your information will be kept confidential and used solely for facilitating the transaction.

item5.question: Can I choose a different method of contact besides Telegram?
item5.answer: Currently, we use Telegram as our primary means of communication due to its security features. If you have concerns, please mention them in the form's additional comments section.

item6.question: What is the minimum trade amount?
